author: ryanleeschneider
content:
I'm getting this error when using `--syncmode full`:
```
INFO [02-13|12:29:14.199] Block synchronisation started
INFO [02-13|12:29:14.818] Looking for peers                        peercount=1 tried=90 static=0
WARN [02-13|12:29:16.026] Node data write error                    err="trie node b205a0…769afa failed with all peers (1 tries, 1 peers)"
INFO [02-13|12:29:16.026] Downloader queue stats                   receiptTasks=0 blockTasks=0 itemSize=0.00B throttle=8192
WARN [02-13|12:29:16.026] Synchronisation failed, retrying         err="trie node b205a0…769afa failed with all peers (1 tries, 1 peers)"
```

if I try `--syncmode snap` it grabs the headers but isn't pulling any states/receipts.  This is using `Geth/v1.10.0-unstable-0ebac584-20210213/darwin-amd64/go1.15.5` from `lightclient/impl-eip-2718` maybe I should be using a different branch?

author: ryanleeschneider
content: `--syncmode fast` gives the same error about trie b205a0
